mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into calendar (title, allday, `start`, `end`, url, classname, editable, `source`, color, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, `type`, memberid) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backgroundcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bordercolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update calendar set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allday = #{allday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `start` = #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `end` = #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editable = #{editable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `source` = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backgroundcolor = #{backgroundcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bordercolor = #{bordercolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, textcolor = #{textcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, allday, `start`, `end`, url, classname, editable, `source`, color, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, `type`, memberid from calendar where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, title, allday, `start`, `end`, url, classname, editable, `source`, color, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, `type`, memberid from calendar where `type` =1

select id, title, allday, `start`, `end`, url, classname, editable, `source`, color, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, `type`, memberid from calendar where `type`=2 and memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, title, allday, `start`, `end`, url, classname, editable, `source`, color, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, `type`, memberid from calendar where `type`=3 and memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
